Broadcom. (2025, February 12). Enabling or disabling Lockdown mode on an ESXi host. Retrieved March 27, 2025.

objects.description: If remote services, such as the ability to make direct connections to cloud virtual machines, are not required, disable these connection types where feasible. On ESXi servers, consider enabling lockdown mode, which disables direct access to an ESXi host and requires that the host be managed remotely using vCenter.(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence ESXi Hardening 2023)(Citation: Broadcom ESXi Lockdown Mode)
